mapper.select: select id, title, description, image_path as imagePath, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM posts;
select id, user_id as userId, title, description, image_path as imagePath, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM posts WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts( user_id, title, description, image_path, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{imagePath}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, image_path = #{imagePath}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id};
